creditline: The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art
description: seven round beads with animal and fish motifs, strung on a string, with bird-shaped bead at top and square bead with flowers, monkey, and bird at bottom; arrow-shaped pendant below square bead with hanging drops of cones, round flower openwork pendants, ribbed-round beads and small blade shapes
dimension: 13 3/4 x 3 1/4 x 1 1/4 in. (34.93 x 8.26 x 3.18 cm) (without drops and bottom pendants)
title: Ornament, one of a pair
